scripts.copy-files:elements: mkdir -p dist/elements/pack/assets/fonts && cat ./dist/elements/{runtime,polyfills,main}.js > dist/elements/pack/mor-elements.js && cat node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js >> dist/elements/pack/mor-elements.js && cp dist/elements/styles.css dist/elements/pack/mor-elements.css && sed -i "" "s/url(fa-/url(assets\/fonts\/fa-/g" dist/elements/pack/mor-elements.css && cp dist/elements/*.{ttf,woff2} dist/elements/pack/assets/fonts && cp -r src/assets dist/elements/pack && cp projects/elements/src/mor.html dist/elements/pack/index.html && cp projects/elements/src/mor-elements-{red,es}.css dist/elements/pack
scripts.pack:elements: npm run build:elements && npm run copy-files:elements && npm run delete-raw:elements && npm run zip-files:elements
scripts.pack-serve:elements: npm run pack:elements && npm run serve:elements
